author: Reuters Editorial
title: RPT-BRIEF-Kerry Group sees 2018 EPS growth of 6 to 10 pct
text:
(Adds link)
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Kerry Group Plc:
* ‍FY GROUP REVENUE OF EUR 6.4 BILLION REFLECTING 4.3% BUSINESS VOLUME GROWTH​
* ‍GROUP TRADING MARGIN MAINTAINED AT 12.2%​ * ‍BASIC EPS UP 10.1% TO 333.6 CENT​ * ‍FINAL DIVIDEND PER SHARE OF 43.9 CENT (TOTAL 2017 DIVIDEND UP 12% TO 62.7 CENT)​
* ‍ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE INCREASED BY 5.5% REFLECTING 9.4% GROWTH OVER PRIOR YEAR ON A CONSTANT CURRENCY BASIS​
* ‍IN 2018 WE EXPECT TO DELIVER ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE GROWTH OF 6% TO 10% ON A CONSTANT CURRENCY BASIS​ Source text : here (11.30pm).pdf Further company coverage: (Reporting By Conor Humphries)
